summary:
I have 20 years of experience in Designing, Delivering and Evaluating Learning and Development Provision. My core competencies include end to end course planning, designing, scheduling, delivering and evaluating to ensure course accomplishment within defined parameters. 
I have made many contributions in improving the good organization of IT training by implementing various processes entailing continual improvement, design and strategy. I am customer focused, highly successful in building relationships with key decision makers coupled with strong managerial, technical & functional expertise. I am an PRINCE 2 and ITIL certified and have completed various certifications including CIPD and ECDL/ICDL
I have received numerous appreciations from clients and top management in my career, for my focused, hardworking and result oriented approach. My ability to use sound judgment and decision-making skills has turned around key processes and business with a positive impact on the top and bottom line of the organization.
In order to learn more about my experience and achievements, you can contact me via email.

[{'company': {'id': 264431, 'name': 'International Criminal Court', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEiMaKxRFVe5A/company-logo_400_400/0/1626421994588?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=fTaEFbt3EbLggoOwR9LTOJomrhAXVKswwOAKBMq6Jfo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/international-criminal-court---cour-p-nale-internationale/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'The Hague Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'International Criminal Court', 'description': 'Under a direct supervision of JIMU, CMS line manager my duties and responsibilities were to:
- Analyse and assess the goals and objectives for the Ringtail training. Working closely with parties and Court Officers and Ushers I was responsible for identifying clear business goals which the training supports. 
- Identify the tasks that Ringtail users needed to perform in new system. Together with Judicial Information Management Unit and CMS we identified what users could do and what they must be able to do with the new system. 
- Determine the training activities that would help Ringtail users learn to perform the tasks. Based on tight and heavy workload of the Ringtail users I decided to use a modular training approach. For each business process defined in goals and objectives a specific training module would be created (such as Documents Package Uploads, Advanced Searches, Binders). 
- Design and develop the training activities. After all questions were assessed during the analysis phase my job was to create specific manuals. I created several user manuals for the Ringtail but also together with JIMU, CMS I created a User Manual for the SmartBoards that have been in use in all Court rooms. - Training Implementation. After the course content is finalized and approved by JIMU, CMS, I held several classes for the Court Officers and Case Managers.', 'title': 'Training Specialist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1859, 'name': 'ICTY', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQG_baUY01_TdQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856126168?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=0BUhwtpR5Tfif7W731CNp_-AposESypIoURMBke0lH0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/icty/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'ICTY', 'description': '- Advising line managers and staff on specific parts related to performance appraisal. 
- Supporting line managers with essential set of information related to the performance management. 
- Assisting staff members with identification of their learning and development goals for the current appraisal cycles. 
- Learning and Development administration including planning, evaluation and monitoring related costs. 
-In charge of PRINCE2 and ITIL training activities.  I successfully organized 4 rounds of PRINCE2 basic and advanced training and 6 rounds of ITIL training. In addition I carried out the planning of all IT class schedules for the entire ICTY. My role also was related to costs monitoring. In cooperation with Finance and Procurement Unit I was making sure that all outsourced training where paid within time frame regulated by organisational rules and regulations.
- Responsible for organising all outsourced training events by various organisational units. 
- Various ad-hoc responsibilities. As part of the HR and Learning and Development Management Unit I was a local GGST (Global General Services Test) administrator responsible for organising and proctoring the test. Also I am responsible for proctoring the test and sending all various test data to the official UN LPE examiners.
- Assisting in designing, developing and implementing ICTY/MICT e-learning. The ICTY/MICT intranet training site offered 30 different interactive training courses to the ICTY employees. Not only can I create OnLine trainings, assessments, quizzes and surveys  but also I am fully skilled to administer our Moodle training server which is a Course Management System (CMS).  I am also able to design effective blended learning solutions that make use of new technologies alongside more traditional approaches
- Designing and delivering business process orientated courses. 
-  ECDL Certified Training Professional.', 'title': 'IT Training Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}]
